page.title: 09 Worlebury hill fort
page.content: The end came quickly for the hill fort. It was attacked by an enemy and destroyed. Many of the people were killed and their belongings taken.We know so much about what happened because the site was excavated in the nineteenth century. Pits were dug and many things were found such as, tools, grain and bones. If you walk up there today it is difficult to imagine what it must have been like.Trees were planted there over a hundred years ago which cover the remains. Today it is a pleasant place for many Westoners to go for a walk.
